data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 8
data.actual_result: No profile picture is shown, it is just empty.
data.expected_result: You should see the default avatar.
data.short_description: Nearby Friends: Default avatar not shown
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have 2 accounts and iOS devices, 1 account with a default avatar - Go the friends tab - Click on the add friends symbol - Search for nearby friends with both devices - Observe the avatar of the user with the default one
